summary: "Off the Wall" is Michael Jackson's fifth album, released in 1979. It's a mix of disco, pop, funk, and R&B, with songs about love, loneliness, and fun. Jackson worked with famous musicians like Quincy Jones, Stevie Wonder, and Paul McCartney. The album was a big success, with four top 10 hits, and showed Jackson's new, individual style. It's considered one of the best albums ever, selling over 20 million copies, and won a Grammy Award.
title: Off the Wall
